welcome_message_body: Welcome to Folsom, where the charm of historic district meets the beauty of nature. Enjoy our vibrant arts scene, outdoor activities, and friendly community as you explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Auburn Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Auburn Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Placerville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Placerville Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sacramento International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sacramento International Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
